artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: two bearded standing men wearing long coats, vests and bow ties, with their arms around each other's shoulders; man at left holds a stemmed drinking glass; four other men seated at a table at left; text at top and bottom: "EL BRINDADOR / POPULAR / GUADERNO / NO. 3. / PUBLICADO / POR / A. VANDEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO"
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: El Brindador Popular (The Toast), plate 4 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
